statements: SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_price_data;
SELECT currency_name, price FROM cryptocurrency_price_data WHERE price > 1000;
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_price_data ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT currency_name, price FROM cryptocurrency_price_data WHERE currency_name = 'Bitcoin';
SELECT AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM cryptocurrency_price_data;
SELECT currency_name, price FROM cryptocurrency_price_data WHERE price > 1000 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_price_data WHERE currency_name = 'Bitcoin' AND date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT currency_name FROM cryptocurrency_price_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY currency_name ASC;
SELECT id, currency_name, price, date FROM cryptocurrency_price_data WHERE price BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY currency_name, date DESC;
SELECT AVG(price) AS average_price, MAX(price) AS highest_price, MIN(price) AS lowest_price FROM cryptocurrency_price_data WHERE date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrencies ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, price FROM cryptocurrencies WHERE price > 1000 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT symbol, market_cap FROM cryptocurrencies WHERE market_cap > 1000000000;
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrencies WHERE volume > 500000 ORDER BY volume DESC;
SELECT id, name, symbol, timestamp FROM cryptocurrencies WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrencies ORDER BY name ASC, price DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT symbol, price FROM cryptocurrencies WHERE market_cap > 1000000000 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT name, price, timestamp FROM cryptocurrencies WHERE volume > 1000000 AND price BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;

SELECT c.name AS cryptocurrency_name, hp.price AS current_price, hp.date AS price_date FROM cryptocurrencies AS c JOIN historical_prices AS hp ON c.id = hp.cryptocurrency_id WHERE hp.date = '2022-11-30';
SELECT MAX(price) AS highest_price, MIN(price) AS lowest_price, AVG(price) AS average_price FROM historical_prices WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-11-01' AND '2022-11-30';
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_prices;
SELECT coin_id, price FROM cryptocurrency_prices ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT id, name, symbol FROM cryptocurrency_info WHERE name LIKE 'Bitcoin%';
SELECT * FROM currency_exchange_rates WHERE exchange_rate > 1.5 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, from_currency, to_currency, exchange_rate FROM currency_exchange_rates WHERE from_currency='USD';
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_prices ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT coin_id, MAX(price) FROM cryptocurrency_prices GROUP BY coin_id;
SELECT name, symbol, website_url FROM cryptocurrency_info WHERE symbol LIKE 'BTC%';
SELECT * FROM currency_exchange_rates WHERE exchange_rate BETWEEN 1.1 AND 1.5 ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT coin_id, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM cryptocurrency_prices GROUP BY coin_id HAVING AVG(price) > 10000;
SELECT * FROM historical_prices;
SELECT cryptocurrency, price FROM historical_prices WHERE date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, symbol FROM cryptocurrencies ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%John%';
SELECT * FROM historical_prices WHERE cryptocurrency = 'Bitcoin' ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3, 4) ORDER BY username;
SELECT p.*, c.name AS cryptocurrency_name FROM predictions p JOIN cryptocurrencies c ON p.cryptocurrency_id = c.id WHERE prediction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, symbol FROM cryptocurrencies WHERE name LIKE '%Ethereum%';
SELECT * FROM historical_prices WHERE price > 500 ORDER BY price DESC, date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_prices ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT name, price FROM cryptocurrency_prices WHERE price > 1000;
SELECT symbol, price FROM cryptocurrency_prices WHERE symbol = 'BTC';
SELECT * FROM exchange_rates WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY rate ASC;
SELECT model_name, accuracy FROM prediction_models WHERE accuracy >= 90 ORDER BY model_name;
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_prices ORDER BY price DESC, timestamp ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT name, symbol, price FROM cryptocurrency_prices WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT currency_pair, rate FROM exchange_rates WHERE rate < 1 ORDER BY rate ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT currency_name, cap FROM market_cap WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 7;
SELECT model_name, description, accuracy FROM prediction_models WHERE accuracy > 80 ORDER BY accuracy DESC, timestamp ASC LIMIT 4;
